notifications.title: 📢 Scheduled Maintenance Notice
notifications.message: Samhiq Mailer services will undergo maintenance on 28-06-2025 from 2:00 AM to 5:00 AM IST. Please avoid sending emails during this time.

notifications.title: 🎉 Version 2.2 Released
notifications.message: We’re excited to announce the release of Samhiq Mailer v2.2! This version includes a polished UI, enhanced notification tab, emoji-rich HTML message support, dynamic tags, and a structured feedback form. Enjoy a smoother and more professional email experience.

notifications.title: 🚀 Delivery System Optimized
notifications.message: We've optimized the email delivery engine with detailed retry logging, visual progress bars, and real-time feedback during sending. Performance and reliability have been significantly improved.

notifications.title: 🛠 Upcoming in Samhiq Mailer v2.3
notifications.message: Exciting features coming soon in v2.3: ⏰ Email Scheduling (Send Later), 📊 Open Tracking with Dashboard, 📉 Bounce Detection with Smart Retry Stats, and 🎨 Theme Customization for the full interface.
